aws_dx_public_virtual_interface.description: Provides a Direct Connect public virtual interface resource.

address_family.description: The address family for the BGP peer. `ipv4 ` or `ipv6`.

connection_id.description: The ID of the Direct Connect connection (or LAG

name.description: The name for the virtual interface.

amazon_address.description: The IPv4 CIDR address to use to send traffic to Amazon. Required for IPv4 BGP peers.

bgp_auth_key.description: The authentication key for BGP configuration.

customer_address.description: The IPv4 CIDR destination address to which Amazon should send traffic. Required for IPv4 BGP peers.

route_filter_prefixes.description: A list of routes to be advertised to the AWS network in this region.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the virtual interface.

arn.description: The ARN of the virtual interface.

aws_device.description: The Direct Connect endpoint on which the virtual interface terminates.
